117000101.name: 斩击
117000101.description: 强力斩击对手，造成攻击力100%的伤害
117000101.description_en: Slashes heavily and deals 100% ATK damage to enemy

117000102.name: 怒火斩
117000102.description: 怒气爆发，大幅度提高攻击！造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000102.description_en: Rage bursts and greatly boosts ATK, dealing 120% ATK damage

117000103.name: 永恒国度
117000103.description: 发出光辉，造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000103.description_en: Emits light and deals 120% ATK damage

117000104.name: 领域
117000104.description: 创造领域，造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000104.description_en: Creates a realm and deals 120% ATK damage

117000105.name: 变身霸王龙
117000105.description: 变身霸王龙，口中发出一波火焰冲击波攻击敌人！造成攻击力180%的伤害
117000105.description_en: Transforms into a T- Rex and breathes a wave of flame to attack enemy. Causes 180% ATK damage

117000201.name: 锤击
117000201.description: 迅速的朝敌人发动攻击，造成攻击力100%的伤害
117000201.description_en: Performs a quick attack to enemy, causing 100% ATK damage

117000202.name: 冲刺
117000202.description: 急速对敌人进行冲击，造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000202.description_en: Shocks the enemy with a rapid speed, causing 120% ATK damage

117000203.name: 风暴冲击
117000203.description: 发出强力的风暴攻击敌人，造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000203.description_en: Summons a powerful storm to attack enemy, causing 120% ATK damage

117000204.name: 大爆发
117000204.description: 迅速找出敌人的破绽，对其进行攻击，造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000204.description_en: Spots the weakness of the enemy quickly and attacks, causing 120% ATK damage to enemy

117000205.name: 变身三角龙
117000205.description: 变身三角龙急速旋转，集中力量对敌人进行攻击，造成攻击力180%的伤害
117000205.description_en: Transforms into a triceratops and spins itself rapidly, charging power and attacks enemy, causing 180% ATK damage

117000301.name: 强力
117000301.description: 对前方敌人发出普通攻击，造成攻击力100%的伤害
117000301.description_en: Deals a normal attack to enemy in front, causing 100% ATK damage

117000302.name: 狂暴
117000302.description: 开启狂暴状态，对敌人猛烈攻击，造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000302.description_en: Ignites its rampage status to attack enemy fiercely, causing 120% ATK damage

117000303.name: 冲击波
117000303.description: 发出强力的冲击波攻击敌人，造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000303.description_en: Releases a powerful shock wave to attack enemy, causing 120% ATK damage

117000304.name: 怒气爆发
117000304.description: 发出致命一击，可以挑飞敌人，造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000304.description_en: Unleashes a fatal blow which knocks enemy into air, causing 120% ATK damage

117000305.name: 变身狂鲨
117000305.description: 变身狂鲨对敌人进行猛烈的攻击，造成攻击力180%的伤害
117000305.description_en: Transforms into a shark to attack enemy fiercely, causing 180% ATK damage

117000401.name: 壹式
117000401.description: 对敌人造成普通攻击，造成攻击力100%的伤害
117000401.description_en: Causes normal attack and deals 100% ATK damage to enemy

117000402.name: 蓄力
117000402.description: 集中力量攻击敌人，造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000402.description_en: Concentrates power to attack and deals 120% ATK damage to enemy

117000403.name: 贰式
117000403.description: 对敌人发出冲击，造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000403.description_en: Dashes to enemy and deals 120% ATK damage

117000404.name: 弎式
117000404.description: 启用火力强化增加伤害，造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000404.description_en: Increases damage by enabling enhancing firepower, dealing 120% ATK damage

117000405.name: 变身翼龙
117000405.description: 变身翼龙，飞向空中向敌人喷出大量火焰攻击，造成攻击力180%的伤害
117000405.description_en: Transforms into a Pterosaur, flies into the sky to flame ceaselessly on enemy, causing 180% ATK damage

117000501.name: 元素攻击
117000501.description: 对敌人进行元素攻击，造成攻击力100%的伤害
117000501.description_en: Utilizes element to attack enemy and deals 100% ATK damage

117000502.name: 基因能量
117000502.description: 积累基因能量，对敌人进行致命一击，造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000502.description_en: Accumulates the gene power to cause fatal attack to enemy, dealing 120% ATK damage

117000503.name: 心灵念力
117000503.description: 吸收周围能量，对敌人发出攻击，造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000503.description_en: Absorbs surrounding energy and deals 120% ATK damage to enemy

117000504.name: 穿梭空间
117000504.description: 穿梭空间，对敌人发出攻击，造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000504.description_en: Shifts space and deals ATK damage by 120% to enemy

117000505.name: 变身天启霸王龙
117000505.description: 变身天启霸王龙，对敌人发出音波攻击，并制造超级炮弹攻击敌人，造成攻击力180%的伤害
117000505.description_en: Transforms into an Heaven T-Rex, launches a sonic attack and super cannonballs to attack enemy, causing 120% ATK damage

117000601.name: 镰刀7连击
117000601.description: 迅速对敌人进行猛烈攻击，造成攻击力100%的伤害
117000601.description_en: Quickly attack the enemy fiercely, causing 100% damage

117000602.name: 雷电之手
117000602.description: 发射一团的电光，对攻击到的目标造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000602.description_en: Launch a ball of lightning, causing 120% damage to the attacked target

117000603.name: 雷神冲击
117000603.description: 积蓄周围的雷之能量，对敌人发出攻击，造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000603.description_en: Accumulate the energy of the surrounding thunder and attack the enemy, causing 120% damage

117000604.name: 审判之力
117000604.description: 发动审判之力，对敌人发出攻击，造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000604.description_en: Launch the Power of Judgment to attack the enemy, causing 120% damage

117000605.name: 变身雷兽
117000605.description: 变身雷兽，对敌人发动持续不断的伤害打击，造成攻击力180%的伤害
117000605.description_en: Transform into a thunder beast, launch a continuous damage blow to the enemy, causing damage of 180%

117000701.name: 蓝焰攻击
117000701.description: 对敌人进行普通攻击，造成攻击力100%的伤害
117000701.description_en: Perform a normal attack on the enemy, causing 100% damage

117000702.name: 无·极
117000702.description: 积蓄能量，对敌人进行致命一击，造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000702.description_en: Accumulate energy to make a fatal blow to the enemy, causing 120% damage

117000703.name: 剑气横天
117000703.description: 发出剑气，对敌人发出攻击，造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000703.description_en: Emit sword energy, attack the enemy, causing 120% damage

117000704.name: 惩·戒
117000704.description: 发动惩戒之力，对敌人发出攻击，造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000704.description_en: Launch the Power of Punishment Ring and attack the enemy, causing 120% damage

117000705.name: 蓝焰·审判
117000705.description: 无敌变身，对敌人发出攻击，并制造超级炮弹攻击敌人，造成攻击力180%的伤害
117000705.description_en: Attacking the enemy with Invincible Transformation, and creates super cannonballs to attack the enemy, causing 180% damage

117000801.name: 风·刃
117000801.description: 对敌人进行普通攻击，造成攻击力100%的伤害
117000801.description_en: Attacking the enemy with Normal Attack to the enemy, causing 100% damage

117000802.name: 天命一击
117000802.description: 积蓄能量，对敌人进行天命一击，造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000802.description_en: Accumulate energy and strike the enemy with a destiny blow, causing 120% damage

117000803.name: 天·刃
117000803.description: 发出天·刃，对敌人发出攻击，造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000803.description_en: Launch Sky Blade to attack the enemy, causing 120% damage

117000804.name: 天醒之力
117000804.description: 发动天醒之力，对敌人发出攻击，造成攻击力120%的伤害
117000804.description_en: Launch Power of Awakening to attack the enemy, causing 120% damage

117000805.name: 变身飞龙
117000805.description: 无敌变身，对敌人发出攻击，可把敌人击向太空，造成攻击力180%的伤害
117000805.description_en: Attacking the enemy with Invincible Transformation, you can knock the enemy into space, and cause damage of 180%
